query: How should I set up type checking and linting for this Python project?
expected_behavior: Agent auto-invokes python-conventions skill when discussing Python project tooling
Agent recommends 'ty' for type checking, never 'mypy'
Agent recommends 'ruff check' and 'ruff format' for linting and formatting
Agent recommends 'uv' for all package management, never 'pip' or 'pip install'
Agent recommends pyproject.toml as the single source of project configuration
Agent mentions checking references/exceptions.md before breaking any convention
